about_the_game:
Ghostly Acres is a cozy idle simulation game where you turn an old house into a thriving inn for wayward spirits with the help of your friend, Flip the Ghost. Manage and improve Ghostly Acres to generate more revenue from your ghostly guests.

Mel started the inn when she discovered the old house she inherited from her uncle was haunted! She was frightened at first, but the friendly old ghost Flip wasn't scary, just homeless. Flip convinced Mel to open up her home to ghosts everywhere and create the first inn of its kind: for ghosts! And so, Ghostly Acres was officially in business.

Build

Your guests need beds to sleep in and places to eat, drink, and be entertained. Build beds, vending machines, water coolers, and more!

Decorate

Build walls, change the floors, and paint to design your ideal inn.

Shop & Upgrade

Use the Bedder Buy catalog to buy beds and other items for Flip to build in the inn. Purchase upgrades for Flip and other parts of the inn to improve efficiency.

Profit

While guests stay at your inn, they'll seek out food, drink, and fun things to do. Guests will have to pay up, of course.
